name: form-to-obj
description: Zero dependency helper to serialize a form into a JavaScript object

scripts.min: uglifyjs form-to-obj.js --source-map form-to-obj.min.js.map -m -c -o form-to-obj.min.js && echo 'Minified size' && cat form-to-obj.min.js | gzip -9f | wc -c

author: Chris Davies <ferociousturtle@gmail.com>
